casebody.data:
COTY v. WEISBART, and six other cases. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 3, 1923.) Nos. 264-270. See, also, 285 Fed. 501. Reiss & Reiss, of New York City (Charles H. Tuttle and Isaac Reiss, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Asher Blum, George S. Hornblower, and Hugo Mock, all of New York City, for appellees.

Before ROGERS, MANTON and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Orders affirmed in open court.
